item.description: Event Description: "Wacky Wednesday". Who: Combined MeetUp and Single Event "Wacky Wednesday" Group. >>> {FYI: "Singles Event" folks tend not to RSVP, so we ALWAYS have more joining us than RSVP "yes" here, so don't get closed out - RSVP now to assure yourself a seat!} <<< What: Comedian (Weekend headliner!) Al Madrigal (see below). >>> Optional: Following the show, you are invited to join us for a "Fire-Pit Under the Stars" after-party at a nearby private home (same place as last week). (see below). <<< When: Wednesday, September 26 - gather @ 6:15 PM. Where: "FUNNY BONE" Comedy Club (within Manchester's Buckland Hills Mall). Cost: $13.50 or FREE with promo Tee-shirt (see below). Misc.: Click the link below to RSVP, see who's attending, and/or for updated details! Please read all details below and DO NOT hit reply or write directly. I reserved 24 seats together on a first RSVP, first served basis via the FREE "CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Group" MeetUp online calendar reservation system: http://socialnetwork.meetup.com/734/calendar/ *** Rather than pay the $10-20 admission fee each time, almost everybody purchases a promo T-shirt (only $15) to gain admission to this and (almost) ALL WEDNESDAY performances for FREE by showing your promo T-shirt at the Box Office - FOREVER (whether attending as part of our irregularly scheduled group, or not). Our group attends "Wacky Wednesday" at least twice per month - more often during colder months. Such a deal! After RSVP'ing "yes", simply show up and gather in the "Funny Bone" BAR @ 6:15 (AFTER picking up your FREE ticket from the Box Office by buying and/or showing your promo T-shirt - telling the Box Office you have a reservation through "Rob's Wacky Wednesday" group). This will give us a chance to gather, have a drink, chat, and enter as a "group", thus allowing us to sit together as their policy is "first come, first seated". Look for a group of 40/50-somethings wearing promo T-shirts and introduce yourself! When the Club doors open at 6:30, THOSE PRESENT will enter together so we can be assigned good tables together and optionally have appetizers, dinner, drinks (no minimum; separate checks have been pre-approved) and get to know each other while waiting for the show to begin at 7:30 (lasting to @ 9:00). >>> If entering after 6:30, please ask the ticket taker to assign you a seat with, or nearest to, "Rob's Wacky Wednesday" group, if still available. All (over 21) are welcome to join us! Invite your friends and encourage them to join the "Single Event" www.TheSingleEvent.com and "MeetUp" www.MeetUp.com to be invited to these, and MANY MORE fun activities of all sorts! Please MapQuest directions to: 194 Buckland Hills Drive, Manchester, CT 06042. The "Funny Bone" is located within the Buckland Hills Mall, on the first floor, between JC Penney and Barnes & Noble, via the external "Blue Turtle" entryway. Funny Regards, - Rob Rob Pudney *** FOLLOWING THE SHOW: Weather permitting, rather than go to a bar, we typically gather around a propane-fueled ceramic "Fire Pit" and listen to some music, dance, chat, tell jokes, gaze at the stars, or just relax with friendly company at a nearby outdoor location. Directions will be provided at the show. <<< >>> PLEASE BRING SOME SNACKS AND/OR BEVERAGES OF CHOICE TO SHARE and a beach chair or blanket for this casual, fun gathering. Please visit or call the Box Office (860) 432-8600 for info regarding the FREE "Wacky Wednesday" T-Shirt promo and/or check their web site: www.HartfordFunnyBone.com for upcoming shows, general information, bios, etc. *** THIS WEEK: Weekend Headliner - Al Madrigal ... ... Jury Award Winner for Best Stand-Up Comedian at the 2004 HBO Aspen Comedy Festival, Al Madrigal is a comic to watch. Called "Dynamic" by The New York Times, Al has turned a flair for storytelling into a standing as one of the Nation's fasting rising stand-up comedians. His unique spontaneous and fast paced lyrical style has already landed him several starring roles in network television shows and earned him numerous appearances on Comedy Central including his own Comedy Central Presents Special, an animated bit on the show Shorties Watching Shorties, Premium Blend, and recently Cheech Marin and Friends Live from The South Beach Comedy Festival. Al has also appeared as a regular sketch performer on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson. Other standup credits include: Jimmy Kimmel Live, Late Friday on NBC, Party at The Palms with Jenny McCarthy, Latino Laugh Festival the Show on SiTv, and Comedy Minutos on HBO Latino. Recently Al was on tour with Dave Chappelle, performing with him at the 1st annual HBO Comedy Festival held in Las Vegas.
